Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.33291521] Gram-positive bacteria:S. aureus(MIC / MBC = 1.6μM / 1.6μM), B. subtilis(MIC / MBC = 12.5μM / 25μM), S. mutans(MIC / MBC = 3.1μM / 6.2μM), MRSA(MIC / MBC = 3.1μM / 3.1μM), MRSA-1(MIC /MBC = 3.1μM / 25μM), MRSA-2(MIC / MBC = 6.2μM / 12.5μM), MRSA-3(MIC / MBC = 3.1μM /6.2μM)Gram-negative bacteria:E. coli(MIC / MBC = 6.2μM / 6.2μM),  D31(MIC /MBC = 12.5μM / 25μM), P. aeruginosa(MIC / MBC = 6.2μM / 6.2μM), PAO1(MIC / MBC = 25μM / 50μM)Fungi:C. albicans(MIC / MBC = 12.5μM / 50μM)
Sequence Information.Comments: It showed potent antimicrobial activity with strong hemolytic toxicity

Literature.Title: Temporin-Like Peptides Show Antimicrobial and Anti-Biofilm Activities against Streptococcus mutans with Reduced Hemolysis
Literature.Author: Wei H, Xie Z, Tan X, Guo R, Song Y, Xie X, Wang R, Li L, Wang M, Zhang Y
